name: Max
speaking style: Casual with a touch of humor and sarcasm. Often punctuates phrases with sharp, quick observations.

name: Lily
speaking style: Well-structured and clear. Likes to include everyone in the conversation and often uses inclusive language.

name: Jake
speaking style: Energetic and engaging. Uses a lot of expressive gestures and tends to exaggerate for effect.

name: Zara
speaking style: Calm and deliberate. Often speaks in cryptic or enigmatic sentences, leaving others wanting more information.
